properties.Observatio: This is a section of hal oya.

There are large trees at some places on both sides of the bank. But banks are eroded. Too much water flows in rainy season. In some places, small amounts of garbage have been dumped into streams, and in some places, reserved lands are being misused.
properties.Descript_1:
Arrange stone packing-rubble packing-River bank

Vegetative cover improving along the river banks (5m x 10m) with Areca nut seedling in 1.5m x 
1.5m grid, Kumbuk/ Mee/ Godapara/ Kaduru/ Aththikka/ Wal Del/ Kekuna/ randomly mixed 
seedlings and planting a
